This website provides a traditional New Orleans Creole Gumbo recipe passed down through generations. It includes ingredients, directions, and tips for making a flavorful stew with a kick. The recipe uses a roux base, the "holy trinity" of veggies, and gumbo file for an authentic taste. Users can also find information on what gumbo is, how to store leftovers, and the history of this Southern dish. Enjoy making and savoring this hearty and delicious meal!
